content: I really enjoy this game. HOWEVER. I have hand lingering issues with the app for some time. On my older tablet, the game would crash with some regularity; thankfully the most predictable time was at the end of a game. I recently got a new tablet (off brand) which I was hoping would run this game smoother. The opposite is true; the game crashes when trying to start a game. I was hoping others might have a solution, but no one else is reporting this problem. Am I cursed?
Great game not 💯 if I'd like if irl but love the phone implementation

I knew it was a great game, but I was getting slaughtered, even on easy level. So, I went back through the tutorials, and now I have won my first game. So here's your five stars! I'm also looking forward to getting the expansions. We'll see if I progress well enough to try multi-player.
Awesome!
Not sure why this game is popular. The theme is lame and the gameplay is uninspiring.

Well presented, nice art and audio, no obvious bugs. It's a relaxing game but feels repetitive. The gameplay lacks a feeling of competition; you have no real agency over the other players' fortunes, there isn't even a challenge or campaign mode.

Beautiful and enjoyable game, but has its flaws. One strategy is definitely better than others (eliminating rot), and there isn't any interaction between players, besides purchasing cards from the same pool. Still, a very nice game, worth the $.
Love the board game and this is a great app version of it
It's a good app, some of the iconography is hard to read. Otherwise very enjoyable
Great game, and a very unique take on deck builders, the app makes it super easy and you can tell that a lot of work went into it, great job devs
Excellent solo experience, haven't tried multiplayer.
Great game, expension a tad expensive
Moss troll does not work. NEVER STOPS ASKING FOR A REVIEW.
Love it! It has helped me to understand the rules for the board game so much better. I would definitely recommend this game.
Great game, would give 5 stars but sometimes does not register the touch screen

Its a good game. The interface is almost flawless. One problem. Your app needs an option to disable the summoning of Google Play on startup. Caves Roguelike has that option, your game needs that option. Do that, and you will have earned your fifth star.

Fun game with less than perfect controlls. When I'm swapping between sections of the board, I often find myself a bit lost in the layout, and accidentally purchasing cards. But cramming such a massive play area into the screen of a phone (even a note 10) is difficult at best, and the game is fun. Best of all, cheap expansion sets!

My buddy has the card version of this game, we play all the time and love it, the app is an exact port and is perfect! This has been wonderful for the social distancing that we have had to do this year.
A visually beautiful game, very relaxing to play.
Great adaptation of the physical game!
Fun game! Love the deckbuilding aspect. Really cool how you build not only your deck but cards. Makes me possibly want to buy the physical game.

Wow! Totally love this. A great deck-building card game with several very unique features. Tutorial does a good job walking you through the rules and caveats of the game. Think I'll even invest in the physical version of this game next. Can't wait to try the expansions!
Runs smoothly. UI is pretty good for mobile. Tutorial is one of the better ones I've seen.
Fun and beautiful deck-building game with a druid theme! This app is great on a tablet.

The game just quit loading on my Moto G stylus. Freezes before getting to the main menu. Contacted developer, received reply inquiring what I changed. Answer is nothing; was working fine until it wasn't. Hopefully they'll do something so I can enjoy this again because it is a truly superb version of the real game (which I own).
It is a good, solid version of the card game.
Great production. Reccomend.
Beautiful art. Colorful animated cards bring it to life. Pleasant music. Buy this, but play on a tablet.
I love this game, and the expansions are also worth it.
Few minor control bugs. Love the game.

I downloaded the digital version after playing the physical boardgame with my boyfriend (his mind works like a computer) and discovered I would not learn during playthrough with him. He encouraged me to download it to better understand the game and I'm enjoying it thoroughly! I shall be prepared to compete with Mr Buttercup soon enough !!

I bought the Steam version and loved it so much that I had to get it on mobile too. A relaxing and challenging deck building game with beautifully crafted cards and mellow background music. Hats off to the developers.
Great fun and wonderful depth. Beautiful presentation.
Fun game with an innovative take on building a deck
It's great, but...where are the other expansions??!! Especially Twilight Garden!

Fun, with advancing levels of strategy. The variables keep each game fresh and challenging. Play solo against AI or compete online. The graphics are beautiful and mystical. Game play interface is easy.
Fun, good replayibilty with DLC
Great game. Except if one of you has connection issues and drops out. You can't get back in. Makes playing with friends difficult. Otherwise would be 5 stars.
One of my favorite board games gone digital and they absolutely nailed it. The cards come alive which is so cool. I highly recommend

A beautiful, fun, and faithful adaptation of the physical game! Mystic Vale is one of the finest deck building games on the board game market today, and this app is a stunningly gorgeous and nearly flawless conversion. No issues at all, tons of replayability, a challenging A.I. with five difficulty levels, local and online multiplayer, battery saver and high quality settings, and best of all VERY reasonably priced; this is one of the easiest 5 stars I've ever given.
Love the card game but Love this version even more.. don't have to worry about unsused abilities
I am very much enjoying playing Mystic Vale. Very easy to learn plus it moves quickly.
Really great game and the app is really well done. The graphics and gameplay are great. I'd love more expansions to come to the app version!

This is a beautiful game that is challenging and quite different to other deck-building games, because of the "card-building" side of it. The AI is quite competent, and so far I've not experienced any bugs or crashes. It scales nicely on larger tablets or desktops. The devs have done a fine job with this game, it has become my favorite deck builder.
Good port of the game, but the app crashes after every game.
Freezes at load screen on pixel 4a. Edit: working now. Thanks!
I cant see the numbers

I love deckbuilders, and this is one of my favorites. The app runs smooth and the controls are very good once you learn the rules. I own the physical card game, and this game makes me wish that the real cards had moving artwork!
If you like ascension. You'll probably like this game too. It's a little more forgiving.
I have the physical copy, and the digital copy is amazing

This is one of my favorite games. I love how the cards are animated. Everything works well and the tutorial talks you through the game. I like how it tells you if you have other moves available. It's a great way to really learn the game. Looking forward to more expansions. I've already bought all that's available. 😁👍
Great game. Fun. Excellent support.

Fantastic game with relaxing music. I enjoy playing before bed to chill out before going to sleep. This app will most likely lead to me buying the physical game. Beautiful art fun and refreshing game mechanics of card building instead of deck building.

This is a breath of freah air1. This is the game I have been missing to fill my time! Totally worth every penny, including the DLC. Now I just need to find a local store that will sell the physical board game. I wish I had known about this years ago! 5/5

I watched Mystic Vale tutorials on YouTube before getting the mobile game, and so far so good! I've been casually playing it for almost a month now and boy do I punch the air everytime a win a close one. If you like strategic card games, you should not sleep on this one :)
Very nice implementation of board game version
It was a fantastic app version of the game. Sadly it is no longer working after Android 10 update. Tried reinstalling but no joy yet. Update: Working again. Increased rating.

Impossible to rematch when playing online; it force closes immediately after the results screen. Waiting for the other expansions to be released. :D I love this game, but even more advancements, leaders, vales, and day/night content would be awesome.

I have never played the board game version, and this game makes a fantastic offline timekiller, vs bots or in person. Expansions are very reasonably priced and add a lot of variety. The AI has a lot of difficulty settings, and I have yet to encounter any bugs. Highly recommend.
They have done a great job of bringing this game to this format!
A very cool game ported to a very good digital implementation. Worth the play!
Great Implementation of the card game.
Fantastický deckbuilder, elektronická verze je mnohem lepší, než fyzická, která vyžaduje konstantní manipulaci s kartami
The only possible issue that I could find with this game is that I wish the font were larger (bad eyes and small phone screen🤷‍♂️). Other than that, wonderful port of an amazing tabletop game.
This is a fun, addictive game. I'm delicately glad I spent the money on it. It's much easier to play than I thought it would be.
Great digital implementation. Maybe a better experience than physically sleeving plastic cards

Excellent game and a good interface for the mobile experience. One major complaint is no asynchronous multiplayer, as it is a turn based game it would be great to play a game with friends as time allows and not be tied to the game until it completes.
Hard to control one's success but it is a relaxing way to spend 10 to 15 minutes here and there. And it has remained fun for a long time.
Very satisfying.

new update makes gameplay worse. game crashes at the end 100% of the time, and please undo the "feature" that forces the game to zoom in on a row of cards when it's selected, it's very annoying. deleting this app until it's ready for prime time.

Fun game, faithful adaptation of the tabletop version,with well-made, challenging AI opponents. I am quite happy with my purchase. (I have a friend who owns the original tabletop game, so I already knew I liked the game concept, but so often the move from boardgame to video game gets screw up. I was pleased to learn that wasn't the case here.)
Very good deck and card building game and very solid implementation
So much fun!

Really love this game - it's a great card building idea. I have a couple of small gripes. When playing the difficult version against the AI, it feels like it's very contrived. The AI gets all the good cards while I'm stuck with 3 of the same! Also, the screen is ever so slightly too small - it would be great if it could be enlarged. Other than that, it's a good game!
Love the board game.... Own the switch and phone version as well!
Fantastic game, great implementation! I haven't run into any bugs and have really enjoyed it. So good!
Very well done implementation. No complaints.

Good game with ability to set up several different ways. It does have a tendency to slow down in the extended game (I'm using a tablet), and I wish the scoring at the end would be more definitive on the different levels, i.e. victory points, shield points (the difference between the blue and grey shields), spiraling, and such. My tablet is small and my eyes are bad and the graphics/font make following the running tally a bit hard to read.
Great game and great app version!
Love this game. My friends and I would like to play it and have it notify us when they have completed their turn, not have to stay in game. Great game otherwise
Great pocket version of a great game!
Complex game with many elements to consider when building your deck.
Fantastic digital version of a fantastic game. The only complaint is difficulty setting up a game with friends. **Editt: oom/game names are case sensitive
Lots of fun. Strategy can be a little tricky. AI is pretty good.
Such a smooth gaming experience! Great implementation of the card game!
Awesome game in rl and in digital... One major flaw is the score counter is too small to read on a phone
Very good implementation of the game. Waiting for the other expansions !
I suck at this game. But i like it. Big issue, I have some expansions but the game doesn't recognize them every so often. It's fairly annoying and I may request my money back if it continues.
Great adaption of the game!

Best way to play mysticvale !!no clean up!!. The probability of spoiling is unforgiving yet you learn to like it. Its hard to have a computer with random dice rolls or cards and not feel cheated. Good job devs Have seen mysticvale on the switch counldnt imagine any difference other than a bigger screen One step closer to mtg on the switch 2.99 on sale was more than worth it

Interesting game. Not sure if it's worth the price tag but I don't mind personally, I have spent a lot more on games I have ultimately gotten bored of within a few months, give it a shot if it sounds interesting to you.

Excellent, feels almost as good as the original board game. In some aspects even better (like it counts the mana for you). AI is reasonably good. The only downside is that the game is slow sometimes and I am unable to get some achievement for all tokens played. But that is minor. I have all the expansions and I will definitely buy any new that you will add in the future.

I'm a huge fan of the original card game and just about anything else John D. Clair designs. This meets all expectations for a digital version of the fantastic tabletop game and then some. So smooth, so rich, so brilliant!
Lots of fun and great way to learn how to play. But even on beginner I hardly ever win. The gem count will show I have the most gems then boom the games over I lose by or even more gems.
I love this game! I own the physical game but hate setting/cleaning up. This app is very well done. I'm learning about things I've been doing wrong 😂 Did you know the mana token starts used side up?!
Great to play on a tablet, phone not soo much. Beautiful artwork
Just as fun as the physical game!

I had never played Mystic Vale prior to playing the app version, but must say that this is a fantastic game. Really smart gameplay, and the app itself is brilliant - really well set out, excellent tutorial to get you started, and just the right amount of animation without going overboard. Very highly recommended!
Great port of a great game !

Great game and one particularly suited to digital because of the card crafting element. Don't like the dark background though which doesn't seem to fit the theme of healing and regrowth. It's trying to look like combative games with armour and damage but it should be appealing to people who don't like that. And the darkness makes it harder to see. Prefer playing it on Yucata.
Just like playing the tabletop game.

The game is a lot of fun. Two gripes: 1) with the AI, at hard it sometimes appears to get in an infinite loop calculating its moves effectively causing the game to crash. Usually happens when I'm actually winning, so it does seem like a bit of a "cheat". 2) Game always crashes on the end game 'results' page when calculating final scores.
Interesting engine builder/deck builder/press your luck

Love the graphics. I have the board game but love that I can now play with my friends during lockdown. Works just like the game, even a bit easier since it keeps track of all the points. Complicated to learn but the best deck building game ever. I'd love to see more expansions to buy!!
Have the board game and the app is true to the experience.
A perfect recreation of the card game! In many ways easier to manage in a digital format, and I love being able to play against AI.
Exceptional card game
Game is addictive
Great app, great almost relaxing game. I don't have the physical game, but it looks like this app convinced me well.
Great rendition of a unique deck builder. Lots of fun playing online and against the computer
Love this game!
replyContent: Thanks for your great review!

content: Perfect implementation of the card game without all of the sleeving and unsleeving. Can't get enough of this one.

As a big player of the board game, I have to say this is exactly how I hoped this app would be made. The game does drain your battery... a lot, so have your power cable handy. I can't wait until the additional expansions are brought in.

I love playing Mystic Vale, and this app has pretty much ruined playing it live. Turns go so quick, that you can play a full game in about 20 minutes. The way it plays is easy enough that if you have played the game in real life, then you should be a able to play the game rather easily. It's also nice how the game gives you a running count of how much mana you have along with the symbols to buy vale cards. And it always reminds you of there are more things that are available for purchase.
Great game. I love the board game version and this is a good adaptation.
This is an excellent game. Unfortunately this digital version forgets your sound settings, which is unforgivable.
Love the board game, love not having to set it up!
Very fun, and easy interface.
Fun deck builder, unique mechanic. Kind of a peaceful game.
I literally played the board game one time, and felt the necessity to play more. This game does the board game full justice. Absolutely recommend!
Very good representation of the physical version.
I played the boardgame with friends, now with social distancing, We continued playing with this app

Love this game! Wasn't sure at first but I see there's a lot of interesting combo possibilities and strategical thinking. Obviously similar to Star Realms and Ascension but I like the unique feature this one has which is you have only a certain number of cards in your deck and so you need to actively plan where to put that top/mid/bottom card. I find the AI to be very good and not so easy to beat. On my S8+ game transitions are smooth almost all the time with occasional and very rare stuttering. Music and card sfx are relaxing and thematic. Tutorial is fairly done but I think it's missing some info regarding how's calculated the final score (what are those numbers on red card and blue card next to the score?) *My wishlist* - Stats? Stats! We need stats! - Moar expansion please! :-) - *A campaign mode would be cool as heck!* - Wish there was a chance to see how many Spoil Cards you have in your deck (accrued also while playing the match). - Also, is there any way we can see the main playing area during the "discard card" event triggered when playing a card like (for example) Mindful Owl or Pacekeeper Druid? I think it's important to see your field and the available cards in the common area when deciding which card to discard. Again, great game. Highly recommended.
Excellent game.

I play a lot of digital card/board games, and this is probably the best port of a card game I've ever played. Devs, if you read these reviews, fantastic job on the port. Please bring your other expansions to the digital game! I need more!
replyContent: Thanks for your great review, Jordan! Much appreciated.

content: I've been a fan of Mystic Vale for over two years now, and the digital adaptation does the physical game justice. There is already a good amount of variety added in with Vale of Magic, and with the other two expansions the replay value skyrockets. Looking forward to more of the expansions going digital and spicing things up further!
replyContent: Thanks for your review, Chris! It's much appreciated by the team.

content: Excellent app version of a great card game, and maybe superior, since it showcases the beautiful art!
The mechanics play true to the game.
Great adaptation of the game but the latest version gets stuck while loading everytime I start the game. Worked fine before. Using a Samsung Note 9

Nomad ignores support requests. Edit: lowered the rating because the game started crashing before showing the final score. Sent message to developer but no response. 3/24/2020: Got email bounced from support email listed below. Tried logging off/on Google, uninstalling/reinstalling, clearing cache/data. Still crashing. 3/13/2020 Games still crashes on Android right before showing final score. Excellent port of the card game. Only complaint is scrolling can be difficult in smaller screens.
replyContent:
Hi. Sorry to hear you are having trouble. Did you try what we suggested? This appears to be an issue with your Google login and should be fixed by re-logging in. We are not ignoring customers: like many, we are currently dealing with 
the complexities of the Covid-19 outbreak. Did you email support@nomadgames.co.uk?

content: Absolutely amazing. It make me feel guilty for paying on my phone when I have the actual game and expansions but it's such a fantastic platform.
Awesome mobile adaptation
Exceptional! Very true to the board game and has even settled some arguments about the rules when playing live. No issues! Please add other expansions!
Major issue recently occurred on 2 cell phones and one tablet, all Android. It auto highlights and has ruined gameplay
replyContent: Hi. Sorry to hear this. We are working on an update to correct this issue now. Thanks for your patience.

content: Very fun just like the card game but being on the phone you can play with out the set up or clean up
Enjoy the solo game and has great replayability.

I love the card game, the video game works well, however, I do encounter quite a few glitchy moments; it still works decently inspite of theses. Update - with the latest update it has been running much more smoothly and doesn't freeze up as badly as before
Awesome digital version of the game 👍 👍

Great game. This port needs more options though. In particular, it gets really slow towards the end of long games - I don't know if this is the graphics or the AI, but it gets pretty much unplayable. Should be more options to speed the game up, like switching off all of the graphical effects. Secondly, there are only three options regarding the game length. I wish there was an option to increase game length in 5 or 10 point increments.
Divine

Thank you for the detailed release notes! They really help know when a particular issue is fixed. The game overall is amazing. Quick note about performance: The performance drops as you add more expansions at longer games though, to the point where I have to wait over a minute before the game un-freezes, and this is on a fast phone.
Loving this game. Fun and challenging enuff for me even at novice level. Haven't played higher levels yet or expansions.
replyContent: Thanks for your review, Benjamin!

content: Beautiful version of the game.
This game is pretty fun, I do think there's a pretty steep learning curve though. The mechanics are simple enough but just knowing what the cards all do is tough.

We absolutely LOVE this game. It is so addicting and we have bought all the expansions. The major problem though is when playing online multiplayer extended games after you are about 3/4 of the way into the game occasionally some of the buttons will seem to become disabled, like the one that ends your turn so your stuck. It usually happens after grabbing a vale card. It would be awesome if there was a way to enter BACK into a game after you have left because of a phone call or being stuck.
Great game, app is excellent
Great game. Takes a while to open saved games. Would like a restore state to bring you directly back into an ongoing game.
I love this game! I bought the physical game a long time ago but I am so happy that they made an mobile version! Great job, by the way, it works so well! Thank you thank you! ♡
This is a fantastic way to take one of my favorite card crafting games in my pocket with me wherever I go! Love it tons 😊
A very intriguing multi layered drafting game. Enjoyed.
as good as the board game.
Great game with endless possibilities!
The card that suposed to prevent a spoil does not work.
Good game
Excellent strategy game.
Great game and it runs very smooth.
excellent app. easy to learn, easy to play
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!

content: A faithful implementation of the board game. Only two of the expansions are curently available. I hope that changes soon.
Great fun.
Good tutorial. Runs very well. Fair price for how much content there is

Love the game and the interface but do NOT love the fact that the game crashes after every game finishes. Fix your bugs people....oh, and once in a while the cards just randomly float around and won't go where they're supposed to....and while I think of it, if I play all the expansions with the large pool the game will freeze....especially if the AI is winning.
replyContent: Hi Vicki. Please contact our support team and we will look into these issues for you - support@nomadgames.co.uk

content: This app is an amazing example of a physical card game brought to life in a digital form. Every card has an animation to it. The AI knows what it is doing but has multiple levels to allow you pick the difficulty for your game.
replyContent: Thanks for your review, Greg!

content: Awesome

Really impressed with this app. Played offline with my husband, and it quite closely mimics the table top experience, without needing a large table. Though a larger screen would be better than my phone, as the interface packs in a lot.
replyContent: Thanks for your review, Emma. Much appreciated!

content: Solid adaptation of the board game which itself is fun. I'd prefer more options to see what cpu players are doing, but otherwise ui is clean and effective.
Great fun
Love the game, but lately it has started crashing. As soon as I finish a game, it will crash and restart
replyContent: Hi. Sorry to hear you are having this problem. Please contact our support team and we will look into the issue - support@nomadgames.co.uk

content: Excellent card game.
Great game.
Loved this app... Until it stopped working on my pixel 4. Will launch and give me a black screen with a title and a wooden plan at the bottom of the screen.
I've been playing this on PC for a while and just HAD to forfeit my time on mobile as well ... I'm still not exactly good at it but it's addictive and the card art and music are stunning

Very impressed! Great fun :) thank you for making this available on phones! It might be a little smaller than I wohld like but thats fine. A little thing I hope would be added is the ability to pause the AI's moves so that I can see what exactly they are doing! Other than that, 10/10!
My brother bought the physical version of the game in a sale. After we played (and loved) it, my flatmate found this app version. It's an almost perfect app version of a great game!
Great adaptation of the board game
Great implementation of a board game. Love the card animations. Great buy!
Love it! Liked it so much I bought the physical version for my parents for Christmas.

Great game. A couple annoying bits: cannot resume multiplayer after being disconnected (game replaces you with AI and prevents room reentry); also cannot invite known players directly nor keep preferred game settings every time I want to create a new game.
replyContent: Hi Vera. Sorry to hear you are having these issues. Please contact our support team and we will look into it for you - support@nomadgames.co.uk

content: Edit: App is crashing after the game is complete. As it starts to display the scores, the app crashes. The scores are not saved to the leaderboard. Please fix. -------------------------- Intuitive game play, beautiful graphics, very enjoyable. Highly recommend.
replyContent: Hi Jenna. Sorry to hear you are having this issue. Please contact our support team and we will look into the issue for you - support@nomadgames.co.uk

content: Amazing, original concept. The single player value is incredible, and for the low cost you get plenty of hours of gameplay. Fans of deck building games should definitely give this a go.
Can't install or refund. It's been six days.
replyContent: Hi. Sorry to hear you are having this problem. Please contact our support team and we will look into the possibility of a refund for you - support@nomadgames.co.uk

content: I bought this app to see if the replay value was good. I highly recommend buying the expansions. But I still replay this often.
For now four star because you asked me too rate but I'm loving it so far. Caused me to buy the physical board game.

This game is great! Good graphics, fast AI player, and plays just like the real thing. If you are a fan, you will not be disappointed. I do wish that online play was better. It's hard to find others to play.

The UI is horrible and not be friendly. The text font and font size is just horrible to ready. I've played the board game and it's a blast just this hasn't is pretty much unusable and needs to be looked at.
Solid single player game though works best as a multiplayer game.

Deck building with a twist as you also build the cards filling progressively their three slots. Gameplay is fun, yet rapidly repetitive. UI works almost flawlessly. Comes with the Vale of Magic expansion.
Great!! I have the real game as well and this keeps it will organized!

This game can be played alone (against the AI), or be played online with other players. I love the concept of building up your cards to make a strong deck, and due to the placement of the additions, the replayability of this game is endless. Fantastic electronoc adaptation of a tabletop game.
Good game

Excellent implementation of the actual deck/card building game with very nice card animations. Nomad Games is really doing a great job of turning table top board games into an awesome digital form. I can't wait to see what they'll come out with next!
One of my favourite games both as an app and board game.

Like the mechanics, but it really feels like too much is decided by your initial draws, leading to runaway situations where you cannot or will always win. This is further exacerbated by the centre row being randomized, which creates situations where you have nothing to buy, or simply cannot buy. App runs well, but my luck and the game design leave me feeling a bit disappointed.
Great game on s7 edge. Won't work on Pixel 4 xl.
I enjoy the game but it seems very luck based. There is often 1 player that vastly out scores everyone else.
I feel like this idea has a lot more room to grow. Hope new expansions keep coming soon.

This is my all time favorite deck building game and it's great to have a mobile port, but user interface is awful. The game board is all layed out horizontally instead of in a 3x3 spread. The next card or proceed buttons are really small and hard to press. And having a full screen to look at your cards and another to look at the board to buy should be an option. It would be nice to see permanent vale cards and my hand in the same place. Definitely playable but not the best experience .
Really good card game, nice and deep ruleset and awesome music.
Runs well.
Real Good game if you like to play deck builders but had to refund because my phone is crappy. Plays just like the real life Card game if your interested in that to

Only 2 modes. Fight CPU or fight players online. There's zero content as far as a campaign or some kind of permanent deck building option. I understand it's a card game, but with the current options I'll be bored with the game after a few dozen matches.
Excellent game... Very relaxing and enjoyable.. Thank you developer. 👍👍👍👍
GREAT version of the game. Text is REALLY small on a phone. A zoom function would be really helpful.
I love this game! I have both the digital game and the card game.😍
Fun accurate representation of. Board game
Love the physical version, this is a very well done translation to the digital form. Appreciate the work going into it!
Excellent. Just like the card game. Love the animations on the cards

Best board game adaptation I've seen. We own the physical game and got this for pass and play for when we have to wait around somewhere, but we end up playing way more. It does all the counting, is smooth, and there's even a bit of animation on the cards. Really great.

I am a fan of deck building games and have played just about all of them. This is one of the more unique and creative ones I've encountered. The game does a good job of combining luck with strategy - just the way deck builders are supposed to. Plus, there is such a wide and interesting collection of skills, cards and features that no two games are ever alike. I recommend this game highly to any fans of deckbuilders.

This is an excellent way to play the game. For the most part, it's an excellent app that I enjoy using. The only problem is that if you get disconnected for any reason, there's no getting back into your game. I've even lost games when I didn't get disconnected, I just went to another app for a second, e.g. when just turning off my blue light filter can cause me to lose my game. Very frustrating when you're well into a game with friends and that happens.
Love the adaptation
Awesome reinventing of a great game!
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!

content: So far an excellent digital version of Mystic Vale. I tend to come in second or third against the AI on standard difficulty. Haven't seen what the beatdown is like on hard yet.
replyContent: Thanks for your review, Barry! Good luck against Hard AI.

content: Very well done game app.

A very nice game, I haven't tried the multi-player yet, as I find even the computer controlled opponents a challenge to beat. Easy to learn mechanics, but not too simple to negatively affect the game play; quite enjoyable even after a few months of playing it.
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!

content: Really great game. Of course at higher levels computer will know what cards you have and play against you which makes it very challenging. I would have given it 5 stars, and have the following suggestions to get it to five stars. For a one person v. computer game, you should be allowed to back up multiple steps. I keep accidentally hitting the harvest button when I don't want to and I can't go back. Also, it would be great to be able to play the same game over again. So perhaps have a start game over button and also save game buttons so you can try different strategies from different points within the same game. Really love it, but especially frustrating when you make a mistake in hitting a button and can't go back.... please work on that one first.Thanks!
replyContent: Thanks for your review Markus. We will take your feedback on board as we regularly update the game. Glad you are enjoying it!

content: Though well designed in most ways, there are some bugs/cheats which ruin the app for me. At higher levels, the AI fakes good play by cheating. It will buy more cards than it can afford, and occasionally add a tenth cursed land to my deck. Edit: Developer replied quickly to my email, and looks to be working seriously on fixing these issues. Second Edit: Two more bugs discovered. The computer player sometimes gets only 8 cursed lands, and has covered up a cursed land with a card in the same slot.
replyContent: Hi Scott. Thanks for letting us know about these issues and sending in your reports. We're working on tracking them down right now and hope to have fixes released soon.

content: I wish the UI could be improved a bit, but I think it would require a lot of subtle improvements. Overall like it.
Wonderful game would have given the game five stars but it is a little small on a cellphone and the controls can be unwieldy. Pads and bigger platforms easy five stars
replyContent:
Hi, 
We've forwarded your feedback to our developers. Thank you for taking out the time to send us your suggestions!

content: Really good. Can slow down over long games.
I downgrade apps that keep asking me for me rating

Best looking card game I've seen. Lots of choices in card types,quite a tough learning curve but well worth the effort to learn. The Vale theme is really original. Good bot AI even on easy. Excellent turtioal. Affordable dlc content also. Certainly 5 of 5 for me.Edit: Excellent Dev team support. Any card game some randomness applies, some luck involved, M V especially requires strategy and planning and perstiance. Though I regularly struggle to win I come back for the awesome card art.
replyContent: Thanks for your great review James!

content: Great implementation of the tabletop game.
replyContent: Glad you like it! :)

content: Exceptional implementation of a unique system Any fan of deck building or engine building games will love Mystic Vale. The AI is challenging enough to keep you coming back for more. Pass and play is also worth mentioning, my gf and I will often stay up late just to get another game in before we fall asleep. With expansions available for reasonable prices this game will offer many hours of casual fun and strategy.
replyContent: Thank you so much for your review! Of course we are delighted that you are enjoying it!

content: Hard to read text on a phone, even one with a large screen. Tablet preferred. Otherwise awesome

This feels JUST like the game, except with the ease of not accidentally miscounting somewhere. Love the physical game but this is a great way to play if noone's around or if you don't own a physical copy. Highly recommend! (It's also very easy to learn.)
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!! Glad you like it.

content: One of my favorite games is now one of my favorite apps.
I LOVE this game. I own a physical copy, but the app is worth it to be able to play on the go.
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!

content: Awesome Game, Awesome App... Loved the game in original tabletop and this is just wonderful to be able to play on the go and multiplayer with others when I dont have the time for a game night. Just awesome!!!
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!

content: Perfect port of an incredible game!
replyContent: Many thanks for your review!

content: Superb implementation of the real life game. Very tough AI at higher levels. Only minor issue is with Wild expansion & the leader that allows left or right on deck card to be used it doesn't allow card to be zoomed in.
replyContent: Thank you!

content: Un excellent jeu de plateau sur Android, utilisant les règles au mieux, j'attends les autres extensions ; j'ai les deux premières extensions, ça correspond bien en fonctionnalités du jeu de plateau

content: One of the best deckbuilders in the board game industry comes to a well adapted, very well priced app.
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!

content: Really fun game and very well done interface. My only complaint is the game absolutely chews through your battery
replyContent: Thanks for letting us know about this, Jeremy. We'll take a look and hope to fix it in a future update. You can put the game into Battery Saving Mode in Settings-Graphics Settings. Hope that helps.

content: Just a great port; good graphics and UI. Quicker than most games of this complexity, and they've already released three (affordable) expansions.
replyContent: Thanks for your review Marcin! It's much appreciated.

content: Very good digital version of the game. Much easier to play than the physical one.
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!

content: Excellent compared to physical game
great but I would like if youi saw other player g field / planting/ harvest
replyContent: Hi. You can tap on the other player's tabs on the right side of the screen to view their actions during their turn. Hope this helps.

content: It a really fun game . But I feel like there isn't enough cards and that it has way too simple of a mechanic
replyContent: Thank you for your review. We suggest that you look at reviews of the expansions. These add many new cards and also new game mechanics that you might enjoy.

content: The core mechanic of "card building" feels pretty complex at first, but the game and user interface do such a great job of teaching how it works that it makes jumping in wonderfully rewarding. Feels a bit like a spiritual and technical successor to Ascension, which is a good thing.
Love it no adding required
Solid digital version of this game. The AI is genuinely good and challenging if you set it to be. Game itself runs pretty smooth on both my phone and tablet.
I have the card game, and this is like it. Good job. I play often. I do have some problems with the interface, but, that's probably more me and/or my phone then the app.
Good port
Great deck builder, well implemented, reasonably priced.
Great deck-builder. Love this virtual version because I don't have to set it up!
Great adaption!

Great implementation of the physical game. I cant seem to invite friends to a multiplayer match but I can create a game and they can join. Clunky but it works. I took one star off because flawless multiplayer would be a 5 star game. UPDATE: I changed to 5 stars because it turns out my friend just needed to update the game to the most recent patch and now we can play online flawlessly. It does not support asynchronous play though. You both have to log in, play a game in real time and log off.
replyContent: Hi. For private games, each player just needs to enter the exact same room/game name and then they will be able to join. Hope this helps, and thanks for your review.

content: One of my favorite physical games, now one of my favorite digital games.
Excellent game. Controls are quite small. And I wish it displayed my spoil chance instead of making me calculate it.
The app sometimes freezes. Even after a force close and a relaunch the game will not progress and the game state is lost. 😢
replyContent: We're sorry to hear that the game does not work properly. You could try to clear the cache, restart the device and ensure that enough memory is available. We hope one of these works for you. If not, contact us at support@nomadgames.co.uk

content: Fun deckbuilding game!
Love the game and now all the math is done for me! WOOT!
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!! Glad we could bring you the fun without the chores!

content: Very fun deck building game. One of my favorites.

This game is great, very good adaptation of the board game. The graphics are very pretty (the card artwork is even animated somewhat) and the music is good. The AI seems to be fairly strong as well. I still win pretty often, but I'm a strong player so I was pretty impressed. My only complaint is the AI's turns are too long. This is true even when set to fast mode; it isn't bad in the early part of the game, but towards the end when turns start getting more complicated (and esp. if you're playing a 4-player game) it can take over a minute.
replyContent: Thanks for your review David. Have you tried switching Fast Mode on in the settings?

content: If you like the analog card game you will love this. One of my biggest complaints about the original is the setup time and this allows you to jump into a fully randomized game in seconds. The controls are simple and the little animations on the cards are a nice touch.
Perfectly captures the gameplay experience
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!

content: Built around an interesting mechanic that I haven't seen before.
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!

content: Absolutely an amazing game. I'm not sure how I stumbled across it, but I'm glad I did. I play a lot of games like Catan and Talisman; while they are also great games, this one is perfect for shorter matches. Mystic Vale is easy to learn, but hard to master. The CPU characters seem well balanced and fair. The music is great and the graphics are amazing. I am honestly shocked this game isn't further up on the charts. One of the best features is the cross-compatibility with PC and phone!
replyContent: Thanks for your great review William! Much appreciated.

content: Do not understand why a card game so unique and immensely fun like this has only 1K download and so even though there is multiplayer function you can't meet no one to play with. Perhaps consider to open the basic pack for free and charge for every other 3 expansions? Will be back again when multiplayer is playable.
Love this game, and this adaptation is fantastic. I wish Nomad had the rights to Food Chain Magnate, Battlestar Galactica, and Robinson Crusoe.
replyContent: Those are all great games! Thanks for your review.

content: Great implementation of the game. The only thing that's missing is asynchronous online game mode.
Good rendition of the tabletop deck builder game
replyContent: Glad you like it! :)

content: Gonna have to agree with that other reviewer. The AI is rigged to have perfect knowledge of every deck, spoiling only when its convenient and knowing exactly which cards in its deck and which advancement are going to show up when. Deleted from my phone. You won't sucker me out of another penny.
replyContent: Hi Samuel. I can assure that the AI does not cheat, but at higher difficulty levels may work out the odds of spoiling, just as a good player is able to. We have gone out of our way to make sure we have a fair and challenging AI system.

content: This game is just plain fun! Keeps challenging. The option to play hotseat or online makes it a great value!
replyContent: Thanks for your great review Jack!

content: Surprisingly decent adaptation. Play with the mechanics without slow players. Expansions are like Ascension, which is a good thing.
replyContent: Thanks for your review!

content: Great game loved the physical copy so it's a nice to have handy when there is no one to play.

content: I really like the physical version of this game and I think they did a really great job on the digital copy.
replyContent: Thank you so much for your review!

content: Very good adaptation of the card game.
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!

content: Best deck building style game I've ever played. Gorgeous art, and cheap! Roughly $6 for all expansions (they're super fun, well worth the cost!) The game can be tricky to pick up, but the lengthy tutorials do a great job of explaining everything. I bought this in conjunction with the physical game for my friends game days, and it's great to have both references, and an opportunity to polish my skills before playing with them. TLDR: fun, strategic gameplay. Beautiful graphics. Well worth!!
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!

content: Great Game, has excellent AI and fun graphics that bring the the game to life. Nice to have the app keep accurate score. Very true to the physical game, smooth game play, A+++ all the way around. Great Job guys! Did I mention several Expansions to keep the game fresh!!! : )

content: Customizable magic card game
replyContent: Thanks for your review Eric.

content: Love this game. As in depth as the physical version, just as engrossing.

content: This game ia beautiful. The graphics and music are gorgeous. It has a steep learning curve but as I get the hang of it I love it more and more.

content: Great game. Cool to have a digital version for play when I have a little moment.
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!

content: Good variation on the deckbuilder theme where you build your cards as well.

content: Good job realy, fun game, good price, ease of use. More please.

content: Great implementation of the board game!

content: Love the board game, app makes it easier!

content: The best deck builder out there

content: This game was a slow boil for me: at first it was confusing, and after that it was hard figuring out a strategy. You basically use cards to upgrade cards. But do you buy more currency? More...Erm...different currency? Or combo with helmets? It's all doable, but it takes a while to get used to it. But what you get is an absolute beautiful and unique card building game. Absolutely recommended!
replyContent: Thank you so much for your review!

content: Makes me want to get the cardboard version! Smooth!
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!

content: May not displace Armello as no. 1 most addictive mobile boardgame but comes close!

content: I've been obsessed with the board game version and its nice to be able to play on my phone on the go👍

content: Great deck builder, enjoying it a lot.

content: Awesome port of an awesome game! Also, please look into asynchronous play.

content: A beautiful game, well thought out and executed.
replyContent: Thanks Robert!

content: Even though the experience is close enough to games like Magic, there's a very interesting twist: you play with sleeves rather than cards, and ypu can complete each of them with three distinct stages, wich will be drawn in future turns. Basically you'll spend the game building your deck and cards, finding ways to harness resources and points as you build your way towards victory. The art and theme are great (as a Christian I'm glad to see a game that won't resort to demons as game elements).
replyContent: Thanks for your great review! Glad you are enjoying the game.

content: Great game, it runs smooth and with out any problems. Game mechanics and rules are awesome. visual art extraordinary
replyContent: Thanks Esteban!

content: undoubtedly one of the worst games I've ever played on a phone. This game reminds me of Monopoly in terms of how much of a role luck plays except that it's also worse since the computer actually obviously and openly cheats on the hardest setting. The AI is so bad that beating it on any other difficulty besides for hard is just Cakewalk. so the developers decided that the computer can just cheat on hard. strategies are predictable and repeatable, too bad I can't get a refund anymore.
replyContent: Hi. Sorry to hear you do not like the game, however, I can assure you that the AI does not cheat. We have re-iterated the AI many times to make sure it provides a fair and challenging opponent. It simply calculates the odds of something happening at higher difficulties. We can issue a refund if you contact us directly - support@nomadgames.co.uk

content: Unique deck builder, where you craft the cards, nice push your luck mechanic. No pay to win, just paid for DLC and nicely priced
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!

content: Since the new expansion dropped, I have had more problems. Certain cards don't function right and end up preventing the game from advancing.
replyContent: Hi. Please send us as much information as you can and we'll get them fixed - support@nomadgames.co.uk

content: Still love the game but since the expansion & update we have not been able to play multiplayer games without it freezing. The only way to get the game going again is for someone to drop out of the game.
replyContent: Hi. Sorry to hear that. Please send us as much information as you can and we'll get this fixed - support@nomadgames.co.uk

content: Very fluid implementation. What I would add would be an indication of how many red symbols remain in your deck.
replyContent: Thanks for your review and feedback Alex.

content: I had to play the tutorial 3 times to really understand whats going on. After finally getting it, i absolutely love this game. I think the tutorial is great, just takes losing a few rounds against the easy AI to really grasp what's going on. I like how many difficulty options there are for single player. I highly recommend, it's a new kind of deck building. If you're getting bored of Ascension and need something new to spice everything up, get this. The expansions are fairly priced too =)
replyContent: Thanks for your great review!

content: Great game with lots of eye candy. The "expansion" tutorial has a bug however that masks the upgrade button when you are suppose to select it.
replyContent: Thanks for your review Timothy. We have now fixed this and there will be an update very soon.

content: love having it on the go.

content: Great implementation of the tabletop game. Highly polished. Look forward to other expansions.

content: Took a while to figure out and get into but I'm hooked now!

content: The UI can be a bit busy and awkward but the game is fantastic

content: Mystic Vale is like no other card game! The app is smooth and with beautiful graphics. I love playing live but the constant sleeving and tear down makes the app valuable to play with my daughter :)

content: Very enjoyable game. Controls are very intuitive. i love the offline and online version.

content: This has always been a favorite tabletop game of our family and the app doesn't disappoint! There are some places the text is super tiny, but it doesn't stop the playability if the game.

content: Great game, glad to see how responsive you guys are to feedback. Ancient Liferoots doesn't seem to be granting the permanent buff of plus one Growth.
replyContent: Thanks for your review Jason. We'll take a look at the issue you've mentioned.

content: An enjoyable fantasy themed version of solitaire, at least the was I'm playing it.
Just like the card game, no made up rules like some boardgame adaptations. The best bit, 0 time breaking it down when it's over.
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!

content: Engaging, beautiful, relatively easy to learn, yet deep strategy, and intriguing, clever deck building mechanic. What a compelling game. I haven't been able to find a full rulebook in the game, only a tutorial and a "quick reference" which is almost useless in glossing over the outline of play. Can someone tell me where to find the full rule guide, or add one if it's indeed not present? That little quibble, though, is not enough to give this fantastic game/app less than 5 stars!
replyContent:
Thanks for your review! You can find a full rule-book from AEG here -
https://www.alderac.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/mystic-vale-rulebook.pdf

content: very innovative and elegant deckbuilder. well translated to mobile.
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!

content: Current wants: Letting you choose your leader in bot games- I want to practice strategy using a specific leader over and over. I've loaded the game over 15 times now and I still have yet to get the leader I'm looking for. If i got to pick that would be so much nicer. I also wish you could choose to play WITHOUT the base game. Letting you always see the timer in online games would be nice, too.
replyContent: Hi. Thanks for your review. The game does auto-save so you shouldn't have to save manually. Also, you can see the online timer when it gets down to the last 30 seconds. Before that, it does not show. Hope this helps.

content: Excellent card game, was a bit hard for me to see graphics well on my note 9. but just fine on my tab A and nox emulator. whether you win or lose the ending seems a bit unclimactic, play it and you'll know what I mean. irregardless, I can tell that i will play this game a lot, very chill. expansions are also very reasonable, apparently with more on the way.
replyContent: Thanks for your review, Mr. Mungus!

content: Artwork is amazing, game play is fluid, solid concept. Worth it. Tutorial needs a little work, is all.
replyContent: Thank you for your review!

content: would be better if pass and play was an option and especially if you could save a solo game and return to it later.
replyContent: Hi Kirsti. We have added both of those features so please give the game another try!

content: great card game, you would be crazy not to buy it! mechanics, art and sound all 5 outta 5, from me anyways! I'm just nobody really.
replyContent: Every customer is somebody important for us. Thanks for the great review. Enjoy.

content: Slow and choppy. Game is unbalanced, and RNG is high. Go play Ascension or Shards of Infinity instead, and you'll save more money and have a better time.
replyContent: Hi Daniel! We're sorry you feel that way about the game, can you please explain what you mean by 'RNG is high'? This isn't a complaint we've received before. Also, how old is your device? Depending on the number of AI you battle, some older devices can potentially struggle to run the game, but by changing settings you can improve performance.

content: I think this is one of the most interesting and innovative digital cardgames I have ever played. The mechanics are very interesting, specially the possibility of combining advances to tune your cards. Graphics and animations are neat, the music nicely accompanies the whole thematic, and the AI is challenging enough for solo play. The learning curve was a little bit steep for me, but after a few games I managed to get the hold of it :)  And yes, in case you are wondering, the expansions available are really worth it, since they further supprot the original mechanics and introduce new ones, overall giving more variety to the game.
replyContent: Thanks for your great review Javier! Glad you are enjoying the game.

content: Fantastic deck building game. I'm a beginner to the genre and was able to pick it up within two games. Highly recommended!
Game would be perfect if it had pass and play.
replyContent: The latest version does have this feature. In the game set up you simply swap the player icon to represent another human rather than AI. Please give it a try!

content: Great execution in bringing an excellent card crafting game to the mobile platform. Furthermore, the knitpicks I had from the initial release were addressed within a couple of weeks. Stellar job!
replyContent: Thanks for your review John! It now has pass to play as you requested!

content: great port of the original boardgame, with a plus of less fiddly dealing the sleeving mechanics
replyContent: Glad you like it! :)

content: Like the game very much. Great that pass&play is now included. However the final scoring seems to be buggy in pass&play mode. No results are shown, only a loading screen.
replyContent: Hi Patrick. We have added that feature! Please update and give it a try.

content: Love love love this game! We have all expansions for the physical game and absolutely enjoy playing virtually with the family (spread out across the US). Edited: bug was fixed, thank you! Looking forward to all the expansions!
replyContent: Thanks for your review Carissa! Much appreciated.

content: Engaging. Works well.
replyContent: Thanks for your review Kisteen!

content: Very nice implementation of the physical game, with an excellent user interface. My only criticism is that the AI (even on lower difficulty) can take several minutes to take its turn. I reduced my review down by a star because the slow/hanging AI is spoiling the game for me. UPDATE: AI somewhat improved, but there remains the occasional complete lock up. Improved rating to 4⭐
replyContent: Thanks for your review. We continue to work on the game and improve areas which need looking at. Thanks for bringing this to our attention.

content: Fantastic game! Highly recommended.
replyContent: Thanks Frank!

content: I own the excellent physical game and numerous expansions. This equates really well to mobile and is one of my favourite game mechanisms. Top drawer game and highly recommended. Only thing is, i've yet to this day find someone to play online with. No one is ever on for public games 😢
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!

content: Great implementation of an excellent game! Smooth interface, gorgeous art, really loving this one! My only minor quibble is that there is no real save state if your game gets interrupted. Edit: Marking down to 4 stars, as the game keeps freezing up during play and is unrecoverable. Edit#2: Adding that star back as the save system addresses my concern and allows continuation if the game crashes.
replyContent: Hi Brian. We have updated the game with an auto-save system so please give it another try!

content: fun so far. never played the table top version. old folks like myself would probably love a bigger font for the numbers.
replyContent: Thanks for your review Kyle!

content: Excellent game.

content: great game...great value

content: great job bringing the board game to the app world

content: Great game on a great app. Only remaining issue after the updates are that the graphics (or something that takes a lot of memory) sometimes freezes my phone or tablet. Great responses to all of my other issues in the older version as well (all of which have been resolved).
replyContent: Thank you for your great review and feedback. The latest update includes pass-to-play mode, which also allows you to select your player colour, and also auto-saving. Enjoy!

content: The AI in this app should be renamed the AL - artificial luck. The increasing levels of difficulty are accomplished less by the deployment of more intricate strategy than by the manipulation of the luck factor so that it favors the AL. It is difficult to follow what the AL is doing on its turn as the graphics cannot be slowed down enough. As it is, if i thought i could get my money back i would. (Though i do appre ciate the addition of the pass and play function).
replyContent: Thanks for the review. Might I suggest playing some online games or pass to play games where the players skill is paramount? We'd like you to stay with the game as there is always new DLC to look forward to!

content: My favorite game to play right now.
replyContent: Glad you like it! :)

content: great port of a board game
replyContent: Thanks!

content: great game needs a couple fixes

True port of the board game. only complaints are that the online multiplayer is (a) not very active and (b) not asynchronous play, though there is a no time limit setting, and finally (c) if the game is closed out or crashes, you cannot continue that game, whether single player or multiplayer.
replyContent:
Hi, 
We've forwarded your feedback to our developers. Thank you for taking out the time to send us your suggestions!

content: excellent game, really easy to play and well thought design of the app. However few downside easily fixable : 1. every time i want to play without internet connection, i cant access anymore the to last expansion that i bought. Very annoying 2. I encountered several bug while playing online. the game froze and it was impossible to play further. Me and my friend were playing in the same room, so with the same internet connection. It kind of demotivated us to play against each other
replyContent: We are sorry to see you are having problems! The performance of the game is a priority for us and something we will continue to optimize.

content: Excellent implementation. l didn't like the physical version because of sleeving and unsleeving the cards all the time, and the digital version eliminates that. graphics are great, and I love the additional touch of the animation in the art. One extremely minor issue is that when the cards you could purchase are glowing, the fade out goes a little too far making it look like you couldn't buy a card you could. Again, extremely minor thing, and the fact that the cards glow at is cool.
replyContent: Thanks for your review, Alex!

content: Very fun indeed
replyContent: Glad you like it! :)

content: Fun game, but pretty much unplayable without a save and continue option for single player. i wouldn't recommend this game until that feature is added.

content: Excellent!

content: Fantastic implantation of the table top game! No more split sleeves.
great port, very enjoyable play.

Fantastic game and very well implemented on the phone! Unfortunately I just had to drop my review by two stars when I reopened my game to sadly find that my progress in game wasn't saved :-( Please make this change as soon as possible, as not being able to save a game in progress is a huge negative and unfortunately will keep me from being able to play much (as it requires too long of a consistent time commitment all at once). Back to 5 stars once this feature is enabled!
replyContent: Hi Jon. We have updated the game with this feature so please give it another try!

content: This is one of the best implemented apps I've played, whether it's a mobile only app or  a tabletop game conversion.  I like that the first update makes it easier to switch between viewing the Vale and Advancements in the market.  The only complaint I have is there's no way to see the flip side of your leader card once the game starts (i.e. in game).  Some of the leaders are complicated, and I want to see the benefit of the upgraded leader before spending my mana on it.  - - - It would also be nice to be able to play without leaders, but still use the advancement cards from Vale of the Wild. - - - The Wayfarer Portal vale is not implemented correctly.  It allows resleeving one advancement into any other card in your field.  The app does not allow resleeving into a blank card, which it should.
replyContent: Huge thanks for your review and support. Point noted!

content: Great. Please do more expansion. And please make the game save so I can stop playing in the middle of the game.
replyContent: Thanks, we will!

content: great adaption of the board game. occasionally has a few hang ups as cards get more complex but runs smoothky over all
replyContent: Thanks so much for the awesome review.

content: Such a fantastic implementation of one of my favorite deck builders. I have no real complaints in terms of the gameplay itself. 2 stars because solo play is unusable without a "save and continue later" feature. I like to take my time when I play but this means that I need 20-30+ minutes of uninterrupted phone use or all of my progress is lost. Even the tabletop version lets me put down the cards and take a break without penalty. This seems like such a basic feature, very disappointing.
replyContent: Hi Jonathan. We have updated the game with a save feature. We hope you give the game another try!

content: I love mystic Vale, and the app is beautiful and well designed. However, is unfortunately somewhat buggy. It freezes frequently, and while it usually starts going again before long, sometimes it stays frozen for quite a while, and occasionally the vales don't refill. it's still playable, but the performance issues are annoying.
replyContent: Sorry to hear that. Can you please contact our support team with as much information as possible and we will look into this for you - support@nomadgames.co.uk

content: Excellent implementation of the 1st card crafting game!
replyContent: Glad you like it! :)

content: Well done, but unstable. UI is good. The AI causes the game to freeze after several turns. It becomes worse with both expansions enabled.
replyContent: Hi. Sorry to hear that. Please contact our support team and we will look into it - support@nomadgames.co.uk

content: Well implemented game. Beautiful, great controls, great tutorial, great single player. I'm marking it down though because of the state of the multiplayer. In a world where Star Realms and Ascension exist, apps need to do better. I need a friends list of people I can challenge. I need to be able to open a room and walk away, so someone can join me later, and then play asynchronously. 5 star game with these features, and I'll probably never play it without them.
replyContent: Thanks for your review Rob. We're looking into Pass-to-Play mode at the moment, but asynchronous play is not currently in the pipeline, although that may change in the future.

content: Really neat twist on the deck-building genre, where each "card" is built over the course of the game.
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!

content: A really good facsimile of one of my favorite games. A few of the mechanics are a little fiddley, but overall fun.
replyContent: Thanks Michael!

content: great app good expansions worth it
replyContent: Thanks Mark!

content: love the app! would love to pick my color...
replyContent: Thanks for your review. We'll be looking to add that feature in an update.

content: amazing conversion from tabletop! just need more expansions added :) a pass and play option would be nice too Wow, was not expecting another expansion added so soon!! Thanks! Vale of the Wild instantly makes this game a 6 star :) Keep it up!
replyContent: Thanks Matt! We'll be looking into pass and play soon!

content: Great game but you really want the expansions for the full experience.
Excellent implementation of an excellent game. However, a lack of save function means you risk losing your game if interrupted. And autosave feature would make this a 5 star game.
replyContent: Hi Wry. We have updated the game to add this feature so please give it a try!

content: Super fun game I'm in love with it, just wish I could find more matches in public.
replyContent: Thanks for your review! Us devs regularly join matches ourselves see we'll look out for you!

content: love it
replyContent: Thanks for your love!

content: Awesome
replyContent: Thanks :)

content: Runs smoothly. Not a battery hog. Good graphics. Good tutorial. Worth every penny.
replyContent: Thanks for your review!

content: Smooth implementation of the board game.
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!

content: it plays exactly like the board game!!!!
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!

content: The app did not work for me. Good customer service though. I will try again when I upgrade my device as I like the game.
replyContent: Thanks Jason. Sorry it didn't work out better.

content: Amazingly done, best mobile adaptation of a board game I have ever played. Interface is beautiful and easy to use, peaceful music and sound effects with fully animated cards. Good tutorial, tough AI. Only con is the lack of ability to save games.
replyContent: Thanks for the feedback Cole. We'll be looking into your suggestion soon!

content: Great game! definitly recommend giving it a shot. worth the money.
replyContent: Thanks Alex!

content: I was so excited for this game to come to android and it has not disappointed! Great app really easy to use, great graphics, great game!! Already can't wait for more expansions!!
replyContent: Thanks Thomas!

content: Excellent mobile version of an excellent card game! Tutorial is strong, AI can put up a fight, and the game runs buttery smooth. Money well spent!
replyContent: Thanks Tim!

content: Should be sleeping, can't stop playing.
replyContent: Thanks Robert! Get some sleep!

content: Anyone know how to change your player color?
replyContent: Hi. The latest update allows you to do that. Give it a try!

content: It's new, so I expected some bugs, and there are. We've competed 1 game out of 5 so far. The graphics are amazing and I love the game so I'm happy to keep trying until the bugs are worked out.
replyContent: Thanks for your review. Please contact our team with any issues you have found and we will look into them - support@nomadgames.co.uk

content: Fantastic implementation of a really good game.
replyContent: Thanks Adam!

content: PERFECT! This is a great adaptation of what is easily one of my favorite deck building games. I'm looking forward to them releasing the other expansions.
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!

content: runs smoothly even on 5 year old device, excellent app but please add save game feature for offline games.
replyContent:
Hi, 
We've forwarded your feedback to our developers. Thank you for taking out the time to send us your suggestions!

content: this game is just as good as the boardgame version, great game! highly addictive!
replyContent: Thanks so much for the awesome review. Please tell your friends about the game and what they are missing out on :)

content: Excellent game i am happy to finaly play it on the go. I would suggest to offer the save option for offline game vs computer. sometime i have to leave few minutes to do something and i comeback and the game qui and i have to start again. Also if you want to add some meat to the app: add some challenge like in the through the age or the star realms app. every boardgame app should have some challenge like these :)
replyContent: Thank you for your suggestions. We have added a save option to the game.

content: Excellent GUI, excellent tutorial, excellent game. I expect to play it often.
Great adaptation of a great game.
Really cool game and I'm glad I finally got to play the app!
Great game with loads of depth, well worth the purchase!
All mystic vale... none of the setup or breakdown. Well implemented.
Really quick gameplay, have to strategize turns in advance. Sometimes have to push your luck when you've assembled more powerful cards. I own the board game, and enjoy this for solo against AI.
One of my favorite boardgames that I never get to play enough. The app plays great and definitely simulates the tabletop experience well for an on the go experience. Fun game and polished app.
perfect

Wow, what an amazingly well produced game with great presentation, UI and graphics.  The little touches of animation to the individual cards is excellent and helps pull you even further into the theme.   The UI is straight forward once you' know what's what and there is an excellent tutorial to explain this along with a quick reference screen.   I can see myself playing  this a lot on my commutes to and from work.  I've installed it on my Huawei P20 Pro and Kindle Fire 10 and runs smoothly on both at high settings.   Highly recommend.
replyContent: Thanks for your review!
